title: Can we hunt without a license? assimalhakeem JAL
transcript: Abdullah from Canada Assalamu Alaikum Wassalamu Alaikum You said in a past video that driving without a license or exceeding the speed limit is not sinful if you don't endanger others. So can I hunt without a license? Can you do what? Hunt without a license Hunt what? Rabbits The answer is the same You can hunt without a license and if you get caught red-handed with your hand in the cookie jar you'll pay a hefty fine probably be put in jail for not having a license for your gun and the likes you're willing to pay the price, be my guest www.mooji.org
